author: parithosh
content:
Nimbus nodes seem to be having some issues with eth1 chain monitoring:
```
WRN 2021-12-07 14:08:38.470+00:00 Eth1 chain monitoring failure, restarting  topics="eth1" err="getBlockByHash(m.dataProvider,\n               BlockHash(m.depositsChain.finalizedBlockHash.data)) failed 3 times. Last error: Parameter [result] expected JObject but got JNull"
```

author: bridge-bot
content: <tersec> Interesting, not one of the new/changed parts of the engine API

author: bridge-bot
content: <parithoshj> I can send you the ip if you need a closer look. Your key is in their :)

author: bridge-bot
content: <parithoshj> But the ips are in the usual place

author: bridge-bot
content: <tersec> That said, https://forkmon.merge-devnet-3.wenmerge.dev/ shows both Nimbus-Nethermind and Nimbus-Geth as following the same fork as other nodes, so it doesn't seem to be interfering too much so far

author: parithosh
content: you're right, nimbus-geth seems to be proposing as well - so it could also be a logging bug

author: bridge-bot
content: <tersec> oops, {"lvl":"ERR","ts":"2021-12-07 15:37:12.076+00:00","msg":"Error creating beacon block","topics":"beacval","msg":"{\"code\":-32602,\"message\":\"invalid argument 1: missing required field 'suggestedFeeRecipient' for PayloadAttributesV1\"}"} â€” I was in process of merging/rebasing that fix. So Nimbus/Geth has stopped proposing for the moment, but I'll have a fix shortly

author: parithosh
content: sure, lemme know and i can deploy it

author: parithosh
content: cool, i'll create an image on top of c4ef375 and deploy it

author: parithosh
content: deployed the new image, have a look when you can

author: bridge-bot
content: <tersec> watching Nimbus/Geth logs. the chain monitoring failure's still there, but seems to be running otherwise smoothly. Looks like it's proposing blocks again at https://beaconchain.merge-devnet-3.wenmerge.dev/blocks?q=nimbus-geth
